Node.Text: Perhaps it is. We'll find out soon.
I see. I hope everything will go well for you, then.
That's good! I'm glad things are looking up for you. You deserve it.
Well thank you for that. I'm certain everything will happen exactly as it's meant to. Thank you for the lift, and have a good day.
I hope it will be, but I'll see soon. The doctor is looking at my cat, Mr. Boots, to solve his problem with ticks. They've been bothering him for quite some time.
That's good to hear. Ticks can be dangerous if left untreated.
Yes, they can, which is why I'm all the more grateful that he's being seen today.
I'm sorry, I didn't know your cat was having difficulties. I could help care for him if necessary.
That is a very kind offer. I appreciate it, but the procedure requires a mild toxin to kill the ticks. It's best left to the professionals.
Node.Hint: Virginia has at least a basic knowledge of toxins and their uses.

Node.Text: Thank you for your concern, but I must be going.
